entry.title: Thursday: Flurries. Temperature falling to minus 2 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Flurries. Blowing snow over exposed areas in the afternoon. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming north 40 km/h gusting to 70 near noon. Temperature falling to minus 2 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 10 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Wednesday 18 January 2023
